an7.33:1.1: “Imam, bhikkhave, rattim annatara devata abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanna kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thita kho, bhikkhave, sa devata mam etadavoca:
an7.33:1.4: Satthugaravata, dhammagaravata, sanghagaravata, sikkhagaravata, samadhigaravata, hirigaravata, ottappagaravata.
an7.33:1.5: Ime kho, bhante, satta dhamma bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti’ti.
an7.33:1.7: Idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayiti.
